alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Wabash; White (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 13 at 7:55PM CDT until March 16 at 8:12PM CDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... Illinois... Wabash River at New Harmony affecting Wabash, White, Posey, Gibson and Gallatin Counties. .Minor flooding continues on the Wabash River at New Harmony. The river is cresting around 17.2 feet and will begin to fall by Tuesday morning. The river is forecast to fall below flood stage Thursday afternoon. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wabash River at New Harmony. * WHEN...Until Thursday evening. * IMPACTS...At 19.0 feet, Harmonie State Park is closed. Surrounding bottomland is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Monday the stage was 17.2 feet. - Forecast...The river will remain near 17.2 feet until early Tuesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday afternoon. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
